Detailed Description

This class represents a Matrix of any size.

It is extended by other classes that build matrices of fixed sizes. The class provides a number of functions that perform all of the typical calculations needed in both 2D and 3D game engines. The Matrix is always sqaure.

See also:
Mat2
Mat3
Mat4
Author:
Ben Constable
Version:
1.0
